page.title: 07Queens Parlor
page.content: Below the Queens Parlor and within it lie the Hermitage caves.The Hermitage caves are so called because many years ago a religous order used to live in them.The caves are big. In one of the caves there are some steps,there are five steps which end in a drop,the drop is not very great,you can jump down the steps to the floor.The floor is very dirty,it has got a layer of old tin cans and leaves all over it.At the back of the caves there is an arch which looks like a window filled in but it was a little ledge.This cave was a chapel at one time.The total length of the chapel was just over thirty three feet.The caves are much smaller now than in 1877 because the weather is wearing the soft sandstone away.
